vsParam:
Rorona,
we brought you the ingredients for making pies.

Thank you! I shall begin my synthesis now!
Add the materials in the Cauldron, and light it up...

Ah, can it be...
[px], Sorel! Come here!

(We have seen [px] making dishes
by synthesizing many times...)

(That's right!
 No one uses the alchemical Cauldron for common cooking.)

(Idiot!
 No one uses the alchemical Cauldron for common cooking.)

(Yeah. I think she just wants to scare us
 by making pies with alchemical Cauldron.)

R, Rorona, you just put all materials inside the
alchemical Cauldron, is that really okay?

Yeah, it's alright!
I can make delicious pies with the alchemical Cauldron!

O, only the alchemical Cauldron?
That's so... amazing.
(Uh, that's great~ Rorona looks pretty happy.)

Alright~ It's done!
Everyone, I give you the delicious pie♪

You're done while we are talking?
... It looks normal, and delicious.

The aroma goes straight into my nose.
(swallowing)...
Come on. Eat it while it's hot!

Ah, how did you make it? So yummy!
It's tastier than any pie I ever had!

Hmmmmmm, mmmm, yummy!
Ha ha ha!

Sorel! This pie is indeed delicious,
but can you not talk while eating!

Ha ha, I'm glad you like it.
I used to make pies in a normal way...

But one day, my master told me that I can't make pies with
anything else but the alchemical Cauldron. But, after some time...

You got used to making pies with alchemy?
You are scary, Rorona...

Mmm. I want some more!
Rorona, I want more pies!

Ah, me too!
Right, you should learn to synthesize pies next time, [px]!

Wow. The alchemy holds infinite possibilities. It really is
a deep and profound discipline comparable to relicology...

Guys, I made one more!
Come, enjoy yourselves!
